keys: C1: Entornos físicos. Hoja de trabajo

    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5056</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Earthquakes</string>
            <string language="es">Terremotos</string>
            <string language="ga">Creathanna Talún</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erdbeben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tremblements de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terremotos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terremoti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σεισμοί</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Factsheet describing the various characteristics of an earthquake. Includes exercises which would be useful revision activities.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa que describe las diversas características de un terremoto. Incluye ejercicios que podrían ser útiles actividades de revisión.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog fírice a chuireann síos ar thréithe creathanna talún. Áirítear ceachtanna a bheadh úsáideach mar ghníomhaíochtaí dul siar.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía</string>
            <string language="ga">Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">C1: Physical Environment</string>
            <string language="es">C1: Entornos físicos. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">C1: Timpeallacht Fhisiciúil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Checkliste, welche die verschiedenen Eigenschaften
eines Erdbebens beschreibt. Schließt Übungen ein, die 
nützliche Änderungaktivitäten sein würden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données décrivant les diverses 
caractéristiques d'un tremblement de terre. Inclut les 
exercices qui seraient des activités utiles de révision.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet que descreve as várias características
de um terremoto. Inclui os exercícios que seriam atividades 
úteis da revisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda che descrive le varie caratteristiche di un
terremoto. Include le esercitazioni che sarebbero attività 
utili di revisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενημερωτικό δελτίο που περιγράφει τα διάφορα 
χαρακτηριστικά ενός σεισμού. Περιλαμβάνει τις ασκήσεις που 
θα ήταν χρήσιμες δραστηριότητες αναθεώρησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">C1: Körperliche Umgebung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
